channel.description: Recent content in login on Barefoot Rob

item.title: interesting login thing
item.description: 10:56 Friday 19 June 2015 JST I just found Clef (while registering for coindaddy after reading the coinparty had been hacked (it hasn’t), and wondering how my RABBITs are doing. (they’re fine)), and am intrigued enough to try adding clef to my static (ahem) site. 11:04 However, I think I’ll add it to my list of things to do, after I work on Unity and fix CB product, and coordinate time with Tess.
